name: Knockout
note:
State #1 will be automatically added when
HP reaches 0.

name: Immortal
Shared Animosity
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
 $gameVariables.setValue(6, $gameVariables.value(6) + 1);
</Custom Apply Effect>
<Custom Remove Effect>
 $gameVariables.setValue(6, $gameVariables.value(6) - 1);
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: Trickery
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
    // Do nothing or add specific logic if the user is knocked out
} else {
    // Subtract the number of enemies from game variable 1
    $gameVariables.setValue(1, $gameVariables.value(1) - $gameTroop.members().length);

    // Check if game variable 1 is less than or equal to 0
    if ($gameVariables.value(1) <= 0) {
        var enemies = $gameTroop.members();

        // Iterate through all enemies
        for (var i = 0; i < enemies.length; i++) {
            var enemy = enemies[i];
            if (enemy.isAlive()) {
                enemy.gainHp(-enemy.hp); // Reduce HP to 0
                enemy.performCollapse(); // Trigger collapse animation
            }
        }

        // End the battle
        BattleManager.abort();
    }
}

</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: Electrostatic Field
note:
<Custom Action Start Effect>
var item = user.currentAction().item();
var enemies = target.opponentsUnit().aliveMembers(); // Get alive enemy members

if (user.isInstantCast(item)) {
    // Play animation on all enemies
    target.opponentsUnit().members().forEach(function(enemy) {
        if (enemy.isAlive()) {
            enemy.startAnimation(77, false, 0); // Replace animationId with your animation ID
        }
    });

    // Apply effects to each enemy
    for (var i = 0; i < enemies.length; i++) {
        var enemy = enemies[i]; // Correct indexing for each enemy
        if (enemy) {
            enemy.gainHp(-1); // Reduce enemy HP
            enemy.refresh(); // Refresh enemy state after HP change
        }
    }
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

name: Rampant Growth
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
user.gainTp(1);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: Berserk
note:
<Custom Leave Effect>
 var hp = user.hp;
 user.gainHp(-hp)
</Custom Leave Effect>

name: Court of Cunning
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var partyCount = $gameParty.members().filter(member => member.isAlive()).length;
var troopCount = $gameTroop.members().filter(enemy => enemy.isAlive()).length;
var totalCount = partyCount + troopCount;
$gameVariables.setValue(1, $gameVariables.value(1) - totalCount);
// Check if the value of game variable 1 is less than or equal to 0
if ($gameVariables.value(1) <= 0) {
    // Get the enemy's troop members
    var enemies = $gameTroop.members();

    // Iterate through each enemy
    for (var i = 0; i < enemies.length; i++) {
        var enemy = enemies[i];
        if (enemy.isAlive()) {
            // Reduce the enemy's HP to 0
            enemy.gainHp(-enemy.hp);
            enemy.performCollapse(); // Play the collapse animation
        }
    }

    // End the battle
    BattleManager.abort();
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: Nemesis of Reason
note:
<Custom Action Start Effect>
var item = user.currentAction().item();

if (!user.isInstantCast(item)) {
    $gameVariables.setValue(1, $gameVariables.value(1) - 13)
};

</Custom Action Start Effect>

name: Finale of Devastation
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
var partyCount = $gameParty.members().filter(member => member.isAlive()).length;
var troopCount = $gameTroop.members().filter(enemy => enemy.isAlive()).length;
var totalCount = partyCount + troopCount;
user.addParam(2, 10);
user.gainTp(totalCount);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
user.addParam(2, -10);
</Custom Remove Effect>
